name: Ranphon
description:
Take control of the small spaceship Phon in this frantic side-scrolling space shooter in which your main goal is to destroy as many enemies' spaceships as possible in a single run. Random powerups should help you reach further distances and destroy more enemies' spaceships in your action-packed run, but your skill will be the ultimate asset to reach for a great score!

> Main features:
- Upgradable spaceship with over 10+ powerups that randomly drop;
- Fire exhaust/cool-down mechanism;
- Regular shot with unlimited number of bullets;
- Special and limited drop-bombs that blasts a greater number of enemies';
- Enemies' spaceships with increasing difficulty;
- Retro-style graphics;
- Hi-Score autosaving.
